ideas.title: The Yarra Tunnelling Machine
ideas.premise: A giant tunnelling machine, decorated with Collingwood colours, accidentally surfaces in the middle of the MCG during an Essendon game.
ideas.why_funny: Local sporting rivalry meets infrastructure fail and accidental sabotage.

ideas.title: The Weather's 'Clear' Choice
ideas.premise: A weatherman enthusiastically predicting 'clear skies' is visibly sweating buckets while standing in a torrential downpour.
ideas.why_funny: Melbourne's famously unpredictable weather makes the forecast ironic.

ideas.title: The Laneway Expansion
ideas.premise: A tiny, overly ambitious gnome attempts to expand a Melbourne laneway by adding a single brick.
ideas.why_funny: Exaggerated ambition hilariously clashes with limited physical ability.

ideas.title: The Moomba Crowd
ideas.premise: A single, bewildered tourist gets swept away by a massive, aggressively enthusiastic crowd heading to Moomba.
ideas.why_funny: Captures the overwhelming energy of a well-attended Melbourne festival.

ideas.title: AFL Grand Final Run
ideas.premise: The sports team's mascot is late to the Grand Final because it got stuck on a delayed tram
ideas.why_funny: Relatable frustration with Melbourne's public transport system delays.

headlines.title: Local government discusses new infrastructure project in Melbourne
headlines.summary: City council meets to discuss improvements

headlines.title: Melbourne sports team advances in regional championship
headlines.summary: Recent victory keeps hopes alive for title

headlines.title: Community event draws large crowds to Melbourne center
Local business expansion announced in Melbourne
headlines.summary: New jobs coming to the area

headlines.title: Melbourne weather forecast: Clear skies ahead
